knimeNode.name: Chunk Loop Run-for-time Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loop start node to chunk table into blocks and run until a specified time period has elapsed.

intro.p: Loop start node to chunk table into blocks and run until a specified time period has elapsed. The user can specify the number of rows to process in each chunk, and the time period (dd:hh:mm:ss) after which the last iteration will start before. The loop will execute until that time period has elapsed, when no further rows will be processed. If connected to a Run-to-time Loop end, the unprocessed rows will be available directly in the final port of the loop end node.

tab.name: Chunking

tab.name: Expiry time
